title: Comprehensive Democratic Institutional Health Metrics Development
description: Develop quantitative and qualitative metrics for measuring democratic institutional health, including early warning indicators, resilience measures, and trend analysis capabilities.
source_document: Outcome Measurement Framework_ Democratic Institutional Health Metrics.pdf
